For general enquiries or to obtain an application form and further details, contact the Board of Graduate Studies
Enquiries that relate specifically to the English Faculty should be directed to:
• Funding for home and EU students
• The M.Phil. in Medieval and Renaissance Literature
• The M.Phil. in Anglo-Saxon, Norse and Celtic
• The M.Phil. in 18th Century and Romantic Studies
• The M.Phil. in English & Applied Linguistics

column2: 2006 Faculty of English, University of Cambridge
